mapper.select: SELECT sum( iv_qty ) iv_qty, sum( mid_bag_qty ) mid_bag_qty, sum( mid_bag_extra_qty ) mid_bag_extra_qty, sum( big_bag_qty ) big_bag_qty, sum( big_bag_extra_qty ) big_bag_extra_qty, sum( total_vol ) total_vol, sum( total_weight ) total_weight, sum( total_weight ) total_net_weight, count(distinct lc_code) lcCount, company_id, warehouse_id, warehouse_code, customer_id, product_id FROM ( SELECT wis.iv_qty, wis.mid_bag_qty, wis.mid_bag_extra_qty, wis.big_bag_qty, wis.big_bag_extra_qty, wis.company_id, wis.warehouse_id, wis.warehouse_code, wis.customer_id, wis.product_id, wis.iab_id, IFNULL( wia.weight, 0 ) * wis.iv_qty total_weight, IFNULL( wia.vol, 0 ) * wis.iv_qty total_vol , wi.lc_code FROM wms_iv_snapshot wis LEFT JOIN wms_iv_attributebatch wia ON wis.iab_id = wia.iab_id LEFT JOIN wms_inventory wi ON wi.iv_id = wis.iv_id where wis.ivst_id = #{ivstId} ) a GROUP BY a.company_id, a.warehouse_id, a.warehouse_code, a.customer_id, a.product_id
